Item.description: An item contains contextual information relevant to a file (or a range within a file).

url.description: An external URL with more information.

ui.description: The human user interface of the item, with information for human consumption.

ai.description: Information from the item intended for consumption by AI, not humans.

range.description: The range in the file that this item applies to. If not set, the item applies to the entire file.

UserInterface.description: The human user interface of an item, with information for human consumption.

detail.description: Text containing additional details for the human, shown when they interact with the item.

format.description: The format of the title and description (Markdown or plain text).

group.description: If set, this item is grouped together with all other items with the same `group` value.

presentationHints.description: Hints about the best way to present this item. Different clients interpret hints differently because they have different user interfaces.

items.title: PresentationHint
items.description:
A hint about how to best present an item to the human in the client's user interface.

- `show-at-top-of-file`: Group all items with the same `ui.group` value together and display them at the top of the file instead of at their given file range.
- `prefer-link-over-detail`: Prefer to show the item as a link over showing the detail text, if the client does not cleanly support doing both.

AssistantInfo.description: Information from an item intended for consumption by AI, not humans.

content.description: Text content for AI to consume.
